snippet.textDisplay: This song... this fucking song... the only thing worth a damn in Sonic 06 was the music. This song however... is the equivalent of... eargasm. Have you ever played Sonic 2's Death Egg with this playing. Its great.

snippet.textDisplay: Sure, the gameplay was bad and the story was weird, but then again there was not all that much story in the Sonic Genesis games except save animals, beat Eggman, you know?  This time it was merely save princess, beat Solaris, travel back in time so it's not weird for the princess to love a hedgehog. I enjoyed the story, as crazy as it was, especially the Silver part.
snippet.textOriginal: Sure, the gameplay was bad and the story was weird, but then again there was not all that much story in the Sonic Genesis games except save animals, beat Eggman, you know?  This time it was merely save princess, beat Solaris, travel back in time so it's not weird for the princess to love a hedgehog. I enjoyed the story, as crazy as it was, especially the Silver part.

snippet.textDisplay:
For whatever reason Colors struck me as a bit...bland.  Technically speaking, it is a better made game than it's immediate predecessors, but it lacked...soul, I guess.  It's certainly not a BAD game, but I couldn't really get that into it, either (I had the same reaction with Donkey Kong Country Returns, for comparison).

Generations, though, is awesome: the biggest flaw is that it's too short.
snippet.textOriginal:
For whatever reason Colors struck me as a bit...bland.  Technically speaking, it is a better made game than it's immediate predecessors, but it lacked...soul, I guess.  It's certainly not a BAD game, but I couldn't really get that into it, either (I had the same reaction with Donkey Kong Country Returns, for comparison).

Generations, though, is awesome: the biggest flaw is that it's too short.

snippet.textDisplay: Now, all that said, I agree Sonic '06 is not NEARLY as bad as it's made out to be: people tend to think it's "worst game of all time" caliber, and even with all of it's flaws it's nowhere close.  I enjoyed it enough to beat it, after all: I always thought 3D Sonic was darn fun despite it's flaws (if they'd just improved the damn camera and stuck with Sonic Adventure gameplay, it would have been fine).  I also thought Silver's gameplay was a pretty cool idea, albeit poorly executed.
snippet.textOriginal: Now, all that said, I agree Sonic '06 is not NEARLY as bad as it's made out to be: people tend to think it's "worst game of all time" caliber, and even with all of it's flaws it's nowhere close.  I enjoyed it enough to beat it, after all: I always thought 3D Sonic was darn fun despite it's flaws (if they'd just improved the damn camera and stuck with Sonic Adventure gameplay, it would have been fine).  I also thought Silver's gameplay was a pretty cool idea, albeit poorly executed.

snippet.textDisplay: The story was not the only bad thing about '06 (and, yes, I both own and have beaten it).  It's loaded to the brim with glitches, the loading times are atrocious, the overworld is one of the ugliest, most generic places I've ever seen in a video game, the sections where you temporarily play as the sidekicks (Tales, Knuckles, Rouge, etc) suck, and there are some parts that are poorly and rather obnoxiously designed (the silver spheres in Aquatic Base, for instance).
snippet.textOriginal: The story was not the only bad thing about '06 (and, yes, I both own and have beaten it).  It's loaded to the brim with glitches, the loading times are atrocious, the overworld is one of the ugliest, most generic places I've ever seen in a video game, the sections where you temporarily play as the sidekicks (Tales, Knuckles, Rouge, etc) suck, and there are some parts that are poorly and rather obnoxiously designed (the silver spheres in Aquatic Base, for instance).

snippet.textDisplay: I'm not a fan of the 3D Sonic games and this one's the worst of them all. I'm pretty sure I'll never touch this game, watching a couple videos was enough. It seems to retain the series' mostly great music though as this is a powerful final boss theme.
